description: Part single part two storey side extension and single storey rear extension.
decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.  Reason: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended). | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing title numbers: Site Location Plan (No Ref), 850/01 (Existing Plans & Elevations), Proposed Plans and Elevations dated 30/01/2014 (No Ref) unless otherwise agreed in writing by the local Planning Authority.  Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning. | Details of the materials and finishes to be used for the development shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the local planning authority before any part of the development is commenced and this condition shall apply notwithstanding any indications as to these matters which have been given in this application. The development shall be implemented only in accordance with these approved details, unless otherwise approved in writing by the local planning authority.  Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1, & 2.1 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4, 7B & 7C of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies 7.4 & 7.6 of the London Plan (2011), the Hanwell Village Green Conservation Area Appraisal and Management Plan, and the National Planning Policy Framework (2012). | Notwithstanding the provisions of Article 3 of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) Order 1995 (as amended 2008), no windows or other openings (other than those shown on the submitted plans) shall be formed in the walls or roof of the building permitted.  Reason: To protect residential amenity, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 2.1 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies 7.4 & 7.6 of the London Plan (2011), and the National Planning Policy Framework (2012). | No part of the roof of the extension shall be used as or altered to form a balcony, roof garden, roof terrace or similar amenity area.  Reason: To protect residential amenity, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 2.1 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies 7.4 & 7.6 of the London Plan (2011), and the National Planning Policy Framework (2012). | The extensions hereby permitted shall only be used for domestic purposes ancillary to the dwellinghouses and not for any other residential or commercial use.  Reason: To ensure that the use of the extension does not, by reason of any other activity, harm the living conditions in the area, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 2.1 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies 7.4 & 7.6 of the London Plan (2011), and the National Planning Policy Framework (2012). | Details of tree protection measures to ensure the protection of trees adjacent to the site to British Standard 2005:5837 including if necessary through appropriate foundation design  shall all be submitted to and approved in writing by the local planning authority prior to the commencement of the development. The development shall thereafter be implemented only in accordance with the approved details unless otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority.  Reason: To prevent material harm to trees in the interests of the visual character of the area and public safety in accordance with policies 1.1 & 2.1 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4, 7B & 7C of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies 7.4, 7.6 & 7.21 of the London Plan (2011), the Hanwell Village Green Conservation Area Appraisal and Management Plan, and the National Planning Policy Framework (2012).
